title: Undo the latest rollout and verify that new pods have the old image (nginx:1.18.0)
description: Undo the latest rollout and verify that new pods have the old image (nginx:1.18.0)

steps: 2. kubectl get po # select one 'Running' Pod
3. kubectl describe po nginx-5ff4457d65-nslcl | grep -i image # should be nginx:1.18.0
